body:
MKL includes `fftw3` wrappers. So `intel-parallel-studio-package` should also provide the virtual package for `fftw-api`. 

My current workaround is in `packages.yaml`:

```
fftw:
   paths: /opt/software/common/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2019.4.243/linux/mkl/
```

And it seems to work...
title: intel-parallel-studio should also provide fftw-api
